script.lang: INSERT INTO AMP_COLOR_THRESHOLD(amp_color_threshold_id, color_name, color_hash, threshold_start) VALUES (nextval('AMP_COLOR_THRESHOLD_seq'), 'Dark Red', '#d05151', 0), (nextval('AMP_COLOR_THRESHOLD_seq'), 'Light Red', '#e68787', 1), (nextval('AMP_COLOR_THRESHOLD_seq'), 'Dark Orange', '#e4883e', 5), (nextval('AMP_COLOR_THRESHOLD_seq'), 'Light Orange', '#f6b277', 10), (nextval('AMP_COLOR_THRESHOLD_seq'), 'Light Green', '#adcd95', 15), (nextval('AMP_COLOR_THRESHOLD_seq'), 'Dark Green', '#7ba05f', 20);
